verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] granted a major disaster declaration for the state of New Jersey for damage stemming from the severe winter storm and snowstorm March 6 - 7 .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: granted] [ARG1: a major disaster declaration for the state of New Jersey for damage stemming from the severe winter storm and snowstorm March 6 - 7] .
President Donald Trump has granted a major disaster declaration for the state of New Jersey for [ARG1: damage] [V: stemming] [ARG2: from the severe winter storm and snowstorm March 6 - 7] .
